title: R packages 📦
text:
R packages 📦


pcutils

It contains many useful functions for statistics and visualization.
See the Github page for the HTML documentation.

MetaNet

It is a comprehensive network analysis package, especially in various biological omics.
See the MetaNet Tutorial

pctax

It contains basic pipelines for omics analysis, especially for microbiome analysis.
See the pctax Tutorial

ReporterScore

Generalized reporter score-based enrichment analysis for omics data.
See the Github page for the HTML documentation.

plot4fun

plot4fun provides many interesting functions for plotting.
See the Github page for the HTML documentation.




Web servers 🕸

iPhylo

It is a comprehensive, automated, and interactive platform for biological and chemical taxonomic analysis, developed in cooperation with Li Yueer.
See the iPhylo Tutorial for more details.

title: Asa’s website
text:
🤺 About myself:

            

🏫 Education
Undergraduate (2018~2022):
Biological Science, Zhejiang University, Colleage of Life Sciences
PhD student (2022~ ):
Bioinformatics, Zhejiang University, Life Sciences Institute
🎯 Focus on

🧬 Metagenomics and microbial ecology: mechanisms shaping microbial diversity patterns, distribution and dynamics.
💻 Bioinformatics and systems biology: developing ecological network or other mathematical modeling approaches for microbial ecology.



🤩 Hobbies


📺 Animation Such as Attack on Titan, CLANNAD, and Rick and Morty.
🦉 Bird watching
🌼 Plant cognition

title: Asa’s website
text:
My blog
I built my blog website, where I share something about biology and bioinformatics learning.

title: 🚅 🛩 🛳 🚕 🚲 Go with 群青 🏔 🏛️ ⛩️ 🕌 🏕️
text:
This is a collection of photos of me and my girlfriend:

KILOGLOW and YOASOBI in HangZhou (2024.4.24)
杭州闪千手。见到了iri，YAMA，Queen Bee，YOASOBI，真的太棒了！
YOASOBI真的太顶了，求求你们来开演唱会吧！

【2024杭州闪千手 YOASOBI 合唱群青】
【2024杭州闪千手 YOASOBI idol】
















































RADWIMPS and Ai Higuchi in GuangZhou (2024.4.24)
圆了第一次去演唱会的梦！RADWIMPS真的太棒了，摇滚嗨到不行，抒情又令人感动。 碰巧还去了Ai Higuchi的live house演出，巨人的几首歌太爱了。























































Sakura and ferry in Wuhan (2024.3.16)
恰逢武大樱花季，和几位朋友约在武汉碰面。










































































Temple and wall in Nanjing (2024.1.21)































































Victoria Harbour in Hongkong (2023.9.29)
快速的一日游，缆车跟想象中的不太一样😂























Bilibili World in Shanghai (2023.7.21)
漫展真好玩，见到了好多UP主。小美太强了，第一次体验到了真正的现场氛围。一定要去一次演唱会！




































































Zoo and pandas in Beijing (2023.5.20)





























































































Sea and birds in Qingdao (2023.5.1)
恋爱两年，第一次走出杭州。这是我们第一次旅行的照片，青岛的海和鸟令人难忘。
